attributes.action: Government to let the public vote on any plans of lockdown or tier restrictions
attributes.additional_details: I want the country to make the choices and have a voice that gets respected as mps are acting rogue by locking themselves in controlled meeting's on tv without the public to ask genuine questions.
attributes.background: I want the UK government to put lockdown plans and tiered restrictions to the public vote.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/551539
